endpoints.name: claude
endpoints.description: Claude operations. action='execute' for code edits, 'command' for system commands with priority, 'plan' for task planning, 'analyze-page' for web analysis, 'verify-changes' to check implementations

endpoints.name: project
endpoints.description: Project operations. action='list' to get projects, 'npm-install' for packages, 'test' to run tests, 'deploy' for Vercel, 'search' for files

endpoints.name: page
endpoints.description: Page analysis. action='capture' for screenshots, 'compare' for before/after, 'debug-monitor' for errors, 'monitor-journey' for user flows, 'analyze-multiple' for responsive testing

endpoints.name: state
endpoints.description: State management. type='conversation', 'project', 'settings'. Use operation='get' or 'update'

endpoints.name: logs
endpoints.description: Logging. type='recent' for recent activity, 'summary' for daily summary

endpoints.name: watchdog
endpoints.description: Process monitoring. action='status' to check processes, 'extend' to extend timeout

endpoints.name: getProjects
endpoints.description: Get list of all available projects

endpoints.name: quickAnalyze
endpoints.description: Quick page analysis. Pass url or project='fu' for Full Uproar

endpoints.name: quickDebug
endpoints.description: Quick debug check for console errors. Pass url or project='fu'

endpoints.name: executeCommand
endpoints.description: Execute any command with priority. The main way to run commands.

endpoints.name: codeEdit
endpoints.description: Edit code files using Claude. The main way to modify code.

endpoints.name: search
endpoints.description: Search for files or code. Pass pattern for files, or use type='code' with query
